com.ssdd.cs.client

Class CriticalSectionRouter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ssdd.cs.client.CriticalSectionRouter

  • public class CriticalSectionRouter
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to a node by it's associated broker. If the node is not found, the class will request all available brokers for the suscribed nodes, to know which service is the one associated with the requested node.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Héctor Sánchez San Blas, Francisco Pinto Santos

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<CriticalSectionService> brokers
      List of availabe services to request the suscribed nodes
      private java.util.Map<java.lang.String,CriticalSectionService> router
      Cached asociation between node and broker

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CriticalSectionService route(java.lang.String nodeId)
      Given a node, provides its associated service.
      void update(java.lang.String nodeId, CriticalSectionService service)
      Updates the local association information with a new association between a node and a service.
      void updateAll()
      Requests all brokers for all suscribed nodes, and updates the local association information.

    • Method Detail

      • route

        public CriticalSectionService route(java.lang.String nodeId)
        Given a node, provides its associated service. If the node is not found, it will request all available brokers for the suscribed nodes, to know which service is the one associated with the requested node.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - the requested node's id
        Returns:
        the node's associated CriticalSectionService, to which it is subscribed

      • update

        public void update(java.lang.String nodeId,
                   CriticalSectionService service)
        Updates the local association information with a new association between a node and a service.
        Parameters:
        nodeId - a node's id
        service - the node's associated broker

      • updateAll

        public void updateAll()
        Requests all brokers for all suscribed nodes, and updates the local association information.
